projects.title: GameHub
projects.description: A React project for a video game discovery app. This was the end goal of Mosh Hamedani's React course Part 1 that can be found at https://codewithmosh.com/p/ultimate-react-part1

projects.title: Using Pretrained Models to Generalize Different Tasks
projects.description: Class project research question/proposal. (Cog Sci 181: Neural Networks and Deep Learning) Research question aimed to methodologically cut down training time and explore potential AGI capabilities of our current Machine Learning framework.

projects.title: Are LLMs Sensitive to Logic-Based Word Prediction?
projects.description: Class project research question/proposal. (Cog Sci 150: Large Language Models) Are LLM's (ChatGPT-2) Able to Solve Logic-Based Problems?

projects.title: Hardware Acceleration of Deep Learning Algorithms
projects.description: A Data Science approach to hardware acceleration of Deep Learning Model Executions. Area of study is HAR (Human Activity Recognition) Deep Learning Models.

projects.title: Frequency Sort
projects.description: Code for a sorting algorithm I thought of. It runs in linear time, given some assumptions about the data as well as knowing the minimum and maximum beforehand. Though it was not able to outperform mergesort.

projects.title: Image Classifer (Convolutional Neural Network)
projects.description: Trained a Convolutional Neural Network to classify images of chess pieces.

projects.title: Metal Gear Solid Alarm Clock
projects.description: DIY project for a custom alarm clock based off the timer from a game. This is the code for the software side of the project.

projects.title: Powerlifting Competitions Data Analysis
projects.description: Data Analysis Practice with python and pandas in a jupyter notebook. Create a linear model to predict outcome potential of a powerlifter based on prior competition data.

projects.title: GNB Classifier
projects.description: Using Python to create a Gaussian Naive Bayes Classifier from scratch.
